Testimony from Frances Watson: the chief investigator in the office of Georgia's secretary of state, stating that the security footage did not show any fraudulent activity.
Confirmation from Gabriel Sterling: the Georgia secretary of state's voting system implementation manager, that the video depicted normal ballot processing.
